divs: Sighting Detailsthis story was told to me by my grandmother she was in the back yard hanging clothes. she heard something hit the trees she looked and she seen what looked like a balloon without a basket with lights around it. see went in the house and came out later and it was gone. years after her death i was watching unsolved mysteries and there was a drawing of a UFO that looked exactly like a balloon without a basket. around the same time my other family members reported another siting of a completely different craft. i also seen a object in 82 here in phoenix AZ but not as an event as theirs
trends: There have been no other sightings in buford
This sighting has never been favorited.
